scripts.start: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all && node bin/web
scripts.pretest: NODE_ENV=test npm run drop-all && NODE_ENV=test npm run create && NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=test npm run seed
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=TEST npm run test:ordered auth banners categories products
scripts.test:prepare: npm run pretest && npm run test
